title: Ticket #7833: gwdatafind plugin should support x509 authentication for cvmfs data
description:
In #7250 we developed a file transfer plugin which uses the LIGO gwdatafind service to request a list of .gwf file URLs, then transfers these files to an execute node.

These files are typically made available by CVMFS where a lot of data requires authentication to access. Let's extend the gwdata_plugin to support x509 authentication, assuming the user has a local certificate giving them the required access.

This is a stub ticket for now, which I'll update later with more specific technical details.
